Package it.polimi.ingsw.controllers

Class ClientController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controllers.ClientController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewObserver
public class ClientController extends Object implements ViewObserver
This class is part of the client side. It is an interpreter between the network and a generic view (which in this case can be CLI or GUI). It receives the messages, wraps/unwraps and pass them to the network/view. Implements ViewObserver
